Lines.Speaker: IG-12
Lines.Text: Hey Bounty Hunter! I have an improvement to test. Would you be my tester?

Lines.Speaker: Mando
Lines.Text: You kidding me right? Who are you? IG-11's devil brother.

Lines.Speaker: IG-12
Lines.Text: Something like that... My ancestor was destroyed due its bad functionalities. I am its replacement.

Lines.Speaker: Mando
Lines.Text: Do you think you are special or something? You are a bunch of cables and gear just like him.

Lines.Speaker: IG-12
Lines.Text: *Looks directly at Grogu* You must give me inmediately the creature or I will activate all my aggressive modes.

Lines.Speaker: IG-12
Lines.Text: Protocol 65-7 detected. Activating all attack systems.
